#################################################

About the game:

Anne is a heartbroken woman, determined to pick up the pieces of her shattered life. While playing a soothing game of solitaire, her mind drifts to romantic thoughts of her new neighbor, and where her newfound freedom could lead. Immerse yourself in HeartwildT Solitaire, a classic solitaire-style adventure featuring stunning graphics and soothing music designed to relax the mind. Make card matches, collecting bonus points for sequential matching, and gather unique level-changing power-ups to help you along the way. Play over 80 challenging levels, bonus levels, and create your own levels with the included level editor. Plus, with random card placement throughout, no level will play the same way twice!
